pkgmetadata.longdescription: Get Seismic Data from the International Federation of Digital Seismograph Networks // This package facilitates searching for and downloading seismic time series in miniSEED format (a minimalist version of the Standard for the Exchange of Earthquake Data) from International Federation of Digital Seismograph Networks repositories. This package can also be used to gather information about seismic networks (stations, channels, locations, etc) and find historical earthquake data (origins, magnitudes, etc).
